title: Noor-ul-Huda Hanfia Institute, D.K. Pora
author: Itzfew
content: Noor-ul-Huda Hanfia Institute is a private secondary school established in 1997 in D.K. Pora, Shopian district, Jammu & Kashmir. It serves the rural community, offering education from Grade 1 to 10 with a focus on both secular and Islamic studies, following the Hanafi school tradition. The institute functions in English medium and is recognized by the district education authorities. As of the latest data, it enrolls approximately 174 students.
